global.title: SGM System
global.browsehappy: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.

menu.jhipster-needle-menu-add-element: JHipster will add additional menu entries here (do not translate!)

entities.jhipster-needle-menu-add-entry: JHipster will add additional entities here (do not translate!)

admin.jhipster-needle-menu-add-admin-element: JHipster will add additional menu entries here (do not translate!)

authenticated.suffix:
, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

password.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 8 characters.
password.pattern: The password must consist of uppercase, lowercase letters, numbers, special characters (@ * ! % ; : . ) and have between 8 and 30 characters.

email.minlength: The user of email must have at least 3 characters.
email.maxlength: Email cannot be longer than 254 characters.

login.maxlength: Login cannot be longer than 20 characters.
login.minlength: Login must have at least 3 characters.

firstname.maxlength: Name cannot be longer than 50 characters.
firstname.minlength: Name must have at least 3 characters.

lastname.maxlength: Last name cannot be longer than 20 characters.
lastname.minlength: Last name must have at least 1 characters.

productName.maxlength: Product name cannot be longer than 50 characters.
productName.minlength: Name must have at least 3 characters.
productName.lengthName: Name must be between 3 and 50 characters.

description.maxlength: Product reference cannot be longer than 100 characters.
description.minlength: Description must have at least 3 characters.

profileName.minlength: Name must have at least 3 characters.

validation.infoTag: Press enter after typing a keyword.
validation.infoCompatibleProduct: Press enter after typing a compatible product.
validation.minlength: This field is required to be at least {{ min }} characters.
validation.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than {{ max }} characters.
validation.min: This field should be at least {{ min }}.
validation.max: This field cannot be more than {{ max }}.
validation.minbytes: This field should be at least {{ min }} bytes.
validation.maxbytes: This field cannot be more than {{ max }} bytes.
validation.pattern: This field should follow pattern for {{ pattern }}.
validation.number: This field should be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.
validation.patternLogin: This field can only contain letters, digits, and e-mail addresses with a maximum length of 20 characters.
